title: MEMS Gyroscope Control System Design and Optimization

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational control engineering, MATLAB/Python-based simulation experience, and basic MEMS sensor principles
context.additional_context: Learners are engineering/science majors aiming to improve practical application skills for MEMS-based control systems

learning_goals: Sliding Mode Control (SMC) and neural network (NN)-based control algorithms can be applied to MEMS gyroscope dynamic models.
System uncertainty compensation techniques can be implemented through composite learning design utilizing a Serial-Parallel Estimation Model (SPEM).
A precision-improved system within finite time can be designed by combining Non-Terminal Sliding Mode Control (NTSMC) and time-varying Barrier Lyapunov Function (BLF).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
